Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: A sweet, laid-back little pub with a friendly vibe and terrific service. Located off-the-beaten-path in Amsterdam, near Amsterdam Centraal Station and just outside the red light district. If you're hungry, order in a bite from Mr. Meatball just 2 doors down. Definitely worth spending a drink or two.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: The atmosphere seems stuffy when you first walk in but this place has a heart of gold. Staff was super friendly and the mixed drinks were superb. All genres of music played in the background and you could have a conversation without yelling. Dancing was encouraged and inside or out there was a friendly and inviting vibe.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: Stopped in for a cup of tea to warm up. We knew it was a bar, but we were a bit wary of "coffee shops". Lovely friendly lady behind the bar, knew we were English so didn't mind us ordering tea!! Lovely friendly atmosphere. Great place to warm up in a long cold day of walking everywhere.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: Pleasant sitting outside on a rare warm February afternoon, enjoying a beer in the sun. We ordered the homemade meatballs, which were really tasty like in a homemade style. Service was very good too, nice little place.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: What a horrible little establishment. Visited last week, hadn‚Äôt even found a table before the rude barwoman kicked my two friends out because they didn‚Äôt know what they wanted to drink. ‚Ä¶

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text:
2*, not 1 because of the cosy atmosphere and friendly staff.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: Terrible experience. Took 30 minutes for someone to come take our order. Waitress was drunk and very rude. When we decided to get up and leave instead of ordering she shouted and swore at us down the street. Not sure how this place continues to exist with staff like this.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: Super nice staff. Went there for a live game. TV is too small for the whole bar and not visible from every angle, regardless of it being a small pub. Could do with an extra TV for these kinds of things.

Review Text: It is a fantastic place. Friendly staff, and they  help provide a very welcoming atmosphere. We have been coming back here for years.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
Review Text: Do not come here. The owner and staff purposely lie about their prices (they‚Äôre not even listed on the menu) and when you go to pay they raise the tab and then threaten you unless you pay. Many other places to go but don‚Äôt go to this dump, trust me!

Review Text: Simple and small but the location is the winner. Movielike atmosphere outside! Heineken and Amstel on the menu, more than enough.

Name: Caf√© de Hartjes
